Lynn.Nahant Life-Saving Station: The Nahant Life-Saving Station is a historic coastal rescue station at 96 Nahant Road in Nahant, Massachusetts. The station, which consists of a residence and an equipment building, was established in 1900 by the United States Life-Saving Service before being taken over by the United States Coast Guard in 1915. The station was discontinued in 1964, and the facilities were converted recreational use by the Coast Guard.
